##A little separation, a big reunion

Micro-signal Yeguangbeifukan

Function introduction the supplement of Xinmin Evening News, founded on May 1,1946, is the oldest comprehensive supplement of Chinese newspapers.

###Today is the Lantern Festival, but under special circumstances, temporary small separation, is to meet the great reunion in the future.

###

###Chinese people celebrate the Spring Festival, the most stress is the family reunion. The main event is on New Year's Eve (New Year's Eve) ; the New Year's Eve dinner, also known as reunion dinner. The whole family, young and old, far and wide, is oriented toward one goal: a stool at the family table. This historical tradition has lasted for thousands of years, this family gene from the beginning into the blood of the Chinese people. This heavy homesickness, homesickness accumulated by the taste of the year, only really engraved on my heart.

My mother had a stroke in her mid-s and a mackerel back, plus two strokes. We brother and sister are also over the age of people, more than enough, to have the quality of care is difficult to do. Later, introduced by people, the mother in the Pudong New Area Donghai elderly care home. The nursing home for the elderly is a combination of treatment, rehabilitation and care for the elderly. For more than four years, my brother and sister and I have been seeing people every week, especially my sister and nephew, more and more often, despite the remote roads (eighty km one way from where we live) . When they arrived, they either took her to a restaurant outside the nursing home or brought her fresh dishes from the day's cooking to her table.

The year before last, my sister rented a few rooms in a farmhouse near the Nursing Home, and the whole family spent the year there.

Last year, considering mother mobility inconvenience, in the nursing home in the town of Donghai, found a hotel, we brother and sister four people, with the family together, accompanied the mother for the New Year.

"sending pigs to welcome rats" , the reunion dinner on New Year's Eve this year, of course, is no exception. As early as a month ago, we brother and sister agreed that at noon on New Year's Eve, the whole family, including the fourth generation, would rush to the Donghai nursing home to pay their mother New Year's greetings; at noon, we would book a table at the hotel in Donghai town for a reunion dinner. My sister also put down a deposit early in case there were no seats at the hotel that day.

The so-called "man is not as good as Heaven" , Jihai year-end sudden encounter Wuhan "new crown pneumonia" outbreak, Shanghai started the defense measures. The day before New Year's Eve, we received a message from the Donghai Nursing Home for the aged: In order to ensure the health of the elderly living in the nursing home, the nursing home will not be open to family members this Spring Festival starting from New Year's Eve.

This year and the old mother's reunion "bubble" , the old mother eagerly look forward to the reunion dinner did not eat, although we are disappointed, after thinking and unanimously expressed appreciation. Yes, nursing homes are full of elderly people, to take such "inhuman" measures, it is a helpless, but the best policy.

On New Year's Eve, we gathered at my sister's house, and Wang Fang, the paramedic, and the head nurse, called my mother on her cell phone to video chat with us. The old mother looks good. We send her New Year's greetings in turn. She was at peace with the news that the family reunion dinner would not take place this year. We told her that we didn't want to eat New Year's Eve dinner this year, so that we could eat it for a long time next year, the year after that, and the year after that.

That being said, on the second day of the Lunar New Year, my nephew still brought home a new dish, rushed to the east China Sea, want to take a chance, to grandma send food, send blessing. However, the nursing home strict prevention, "stay vegetables do not enter the people, " the nephew had to put down to take the vegetables, by the medical staff up, he drove back. Look at the slogan of the field "return home with illness unfilial son Lang, infected parents lose conscience" , he still dare to rush?

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
On the fourth day of the year, we got a call from the new head nurse, Fan Jiakai (a male nurse) , who had asked my sister to join him in the group he had built for the families of all the elderly people he cared for. He told us that the old man is all right, please rest assured, at the same time warm heart to tell us, as long as the family request, he will open the mobile phone video mode for us, let the family and the old man call.

With a nursing home like this, with a nursing staff like this, we're relieved. Family members are united with them, not to have such a domineering slogan: "Honestly at home to prevent infection, the father-in-law has to be chased. " Yes, this year's Spring Festival not to see MOM, only for the same disease!
